pages.text: The Chat Box peripheral allows you to interact with the game chat by sending and receiving messages.$(p)You can even send messages that are only visible for the Chat Box if you start your message with a `$`.$(p)For the full documentation please see the $(9)$(l:https://docs.srendi.de/peripherals/chat_box/)official wiki page$(/l)$()!
Connect your Chat Box to a computer to make use of it!
